message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This service plan has already been cancelled.
This service plan has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_BLANK_TYPE
message.locale: Service plan type must not be blank.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_FV_MODIFY_CANCELED
message.locale: This service plan has been cancelled and cannot be modified.
This service plan has been canceled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XRV_SERVICE_PLAN_TYPE_EXISTS
message.locale: A service plan of this type already exists. Service Plan type must be unique.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XFV_GOAL_CANCELED
message.locale: This goal has been cancelled and cannot be added to the service plan.
This goal has been canceled and cannot be added to the service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XFV_GOAL_EXISTS
message.locale: This goal has already been added to the service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XFV_CASE_CANCELED
message.locale: This case has been cancelled and cannot be added to the service plan.
This case has been canceled and cannot be added to the service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XFV_CASE_EXISTS
message.locale: This case has already been added to the service plan.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEPLAN_XFV_TEMPLATE_EXISTS
message.locale: This template has already been added to the service plan.
